text: @MSNBC More public figures, and citizens with a platform of any type, need to be demanding resignations. I mean, my god, what a betrayal of the public trust. These weren't even difficult decisions - just listen to the experts and lead. Instead, we have 133,000 Americans dead. #COVID19
